CustomField.description: This is a text field rather than a number field because we don't want (for example) the year 2020 to show up as 2,020. There is a validation rule in place to make sure we only get valid year values for this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Approximation of the year this person started in the industry. If they select "0-4 years," we assume 2 years experience. If they select "5-9 years," we assume 7 years experience. If they select "10+ years," we assume 12 years experience.
CustomField.label: Start Year (approximate)
